title: Mast cell-specific CysLT2 receptor signaling inhibits cysteinyl leukotriene-dependent mast cell activation and type 2 allergic lung inflammation.
abstract: Cysteinyl leukotrienes (cysLTs) promote type 2 inflammation (T2I) by signaling through the type 1 and 3 cysLT-specific G protein-coupled receptors (GPCRs) (CysLT
